com.netflix.genie.server.services

Interface ApplicationConfigService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationConfigServiceJPAImpl

    public interface ApplicationConfigService
    Abstraction layer to encapsulate ApplicationConfig functionality.
    Classes implementing this abstraction layer must be thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

        Parameters:
        app - The application configuration to create
        Returns:

      • getApplication

        com.netflix.genie.common.model.Application getApplication(java.lang.String id)
                                                   throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException
        Gets application for given id.
        Parameters:
        id - unique id for application configuration to get. Not null/empty.
        Returns:
        The application if one exists or null if not.
        Throws:
        com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException - if there is an error

      • getApplications

        java.util.List<com.netflix.genie.common.model.Application> getApplications(java.lang.String name,
                                                                           java.lang.String userName,
                                                                           java.util.Set<com.netflix.genie.common.model.ApplicationStatus> statuses,
                                                                           java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tags,
                                                                           int page,
                                                                           int limit)
        Get applications for given filter criteria.
        Parameters:
        name - name of application. Can be null or empty.
        userName - The user who created the application. Can be null/empty
        statuses - The statuses of the applications to find. Can be null.
        tags - tags allocated to this application
        page - Page number to start results on
        limit - Max number of results per page
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code

        Add a configuration file to the application.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the application to add the configuration file to. Not null/empty/blank.

        Returns:
        The active set of configurations

                                                  throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException
        Get the set of configuration files associated with the application with given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the application to get the configuration files for. Not null/empty/blank.
        Returns:
        The set of configuration files as paths
        Throws:
        com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException - if there is an error

        Update the set of configuration files associated with the application with given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the application to update the configuration files for. Not null/empty/blank.
        configs - The configuration files to replace existing configurations with. Not null/empty.
        Returns:
        The active set of configurations
